A Message from Standard BioTools CEO
Standard BioTools™ , previously known as Fluidigm® , is driven by a  
bold purpose – Unleashing tools to accelerate breakthroughs in human 
health™ . Standard BioTools provides an established portfolio of 
essential, standardized technologies that empower customers to scale 
and accelerate their life sciences research through the delivery of 
consistent, reliable, and repeatable results. 
Consistent with this vision, we strive to conduct our business in a 
manner that demonstrates our concern for the global environment 
and our desire for the well-being of all people. We believe that good 
corporate governance practices are essential to achieving this goal.
The Standard BioTools Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) 
Report comprises a published overview of our environmental, social, 
and governance efforts and practices.
As we continue to work toward operational excellence, our annual ESG 
Report will evolve with innovative approaches to conduct our business 
in a sustainable and environmentally conscious manner and improve 
our processes to ensure that we are evaluating our impact across our 
entire spectrum of stakeholders.
Michael Egholm , 
President and Chief Executive Officer
